solution_line_template: The total time we spent going to school is {time_to_gate} minutes + {time_to_building} minutes = <<{time_to_gate}+{time_to_building}={total_time_spent}>>{total_time_spent} minutes.
We have {total_time_allowed} minutes - {total_time_spent} minutes = <<{total_time_allowed}-{total_time_spent}={time_left}>>{time_left} minutes left not to be late.
